      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        Called when the program is shutting down.

      • getSystemBundle

        public static TextBundle getSystemBundle()
        Return a bundle representing system text and messages. This bundle may have passages shadowed by a game-specific bundle installed to customize messages.
        Returns:
        bundle with system passages

      • setGameBundle

        public static void setGameBundle(TextBundle b)
        Installs a bundle as a game-specific bundle in front of the default system bundle, in order to customize game messages.
        Parameters:
        b - game-specific bundle, or null to remove any such bundle. If this bundle does not have the default system bundle in its parent chain, the default system bundle will be placed in its parent chain.
